question: Manish Misra has been appointed as the Chief Innovation Officer (CIO) of this company's India business.
explanation: Panasonic India, a technology and innovation firm, has appointed Manish Misra as the Chief Innovation Officer (CIO) of its India business. Manish Misra will be responsible for the strategic development of innovation and technology and will lead Panasonic's innovation hub in India. As Chief Innovation Officer (CIO), Manish Misra will report to Manish Sharma, President and CEO, Panasonic India. Earlier, Manish Misra worked with HID Global as its India R&D Head and Vice President of Engineering and Innovation.
